name: Delivery (Ardoos, green_tito)
description:
We tried to create a short story about helping your community.

Everyone has to stay at home due to the monster that is killing people in the neighbourhood. Help the inhabitants by delivering them, things that they need.
It's up to you to decide - be helpful or be a little prick that makes life difficult for others.

We tried our best but the project isn’t quite a finished jet. You’re playing what team of two people can do in less than 48 hours.

Music: "Blues for Jan" by Martijn de Boer (NiGiD)
